data.title: “Battle of the Network Stars”
data.meta_description: Posts about “Battle of the Network Stars” written by bobbymgsk
data.text:
“Battle of the Network Stars”- EP. 9

Famous TV Families: Barry Williams, Beverley Mitchell, Willie Aames, Charlene Tilton & Danny Bonaduce

TV Doctors: Thomas Calabro, Rachelle Lefevre, Taye Diggs, Benjamin Hollingsworth & Deidre Hall

RR: TV DOCTORS

Basketball: Taye v. Charlene– TAYE

Tennis: Barry v. Thomas– THOMAS

SR: TV DOCTORS

KR: TV DOCTORS

DT: TV DOCTORS, TWICE

Archery: Deidre v. Willie– WILLIE

Golf: Beverley v. Benjamin– BEVERLEY

Soccer: Danny v. Rachelle– DANNY

OC:

Women: Rachelle v. Beverley– RACHELLE

Men: Danny v. Thomas– THOMAS

For the 1st (& likely only) time on this series, a team had to be at a disadvantage for the Tug of War because they were behind by more than 10 pts.- in this case for the Famous TV Families, they had to pull from a green line (making it worth 15).

W- TV DOCTORS

“Battle of the Network Stars” 7/20

Primetime Soaps: Ian Z., Gabrielle Carteris, Mischa Barton, Donna Mills & Josh Henderson

abc Stars: Anson Williams, Jason Hervey, Olivia D’Abo, Michael Fishman & Shari Belafonte

Vehicles Also Used: Mercedes-Benz E-Class Sdn (I think) & Lincoln Continental

RR: PRIMETIME SOAPS (but Josh had to get medical attention due to exhaustion)

Soccer: Mischa v. Jason– MISCHA

SR: STARS

Basketball: Ian v. Anson– IAN

DT:

Primetime Soaps: ONE (4)

abc Stars: TWO (3)

Tennis: Donna v. Shari– DONNA

Archery: Gabrielle v. Michael– MICHAEL

Golf: Josh v. Olivia– JOSH

OC:

Women: Mischa v. Olivia– OLIVIA

Men: Josh v. Michael– JOSH

W- STARS

REVIVAL: “Battle of the Network Stars”

Mike Greenberg & Joe Tessitore were the main commentators from Pepperdine University. All participants were driven in a Lincoln MKT Town Car or a Cadillac ATS. Cari Champion & Cassidy Hubbarth were the sideline reporters.

TV Sitcoms: Dave Coulier, Bronson Pinchot, Tracey Gold, AJ Michalka & Tom Arnold (who showed up a little late)(Coach: DeMarcus Ware)

TV Kids: Kim Fields, Lisa Whelchel, Corbin Bleu, Joey Lawrence & Nolan Gould (Coach: Ronda Rousey)

Event #1: Running Relay (400m)- TV KIDS GOT THE FIRST POINT

E #2: Swim Relay (25m each way)- TV SITCOMS TIED IT UP

E #3: Kayak Relay (50m each way)- TV KIDS BACK ON TOP BY ONE PT.

E #4: Basketball (25 three-pt. shots): Dave v. Joey– DAVE RE-TIED THE ACTION

E #5: Soccer (five shots from penalty-kick distance): Kim v. Tracey– KIM WON HER TEAM A THIRD PT.

E #6: Dunk Tank (three throws per team; one pt. per dunk)- IT WAS NOW TIED AT FOUR ALL AFTER THAT

E #7: Tennis (20 groundstrokes): AJ v. Lisa– LISA WON

E #8: Archery (three shots): Bronson v. Nolan– NOLAN SHUTOUT BRONSON

E #9: Golf (one tee shot from 60yds- closest to the pin won): Tom v. Corbin– ANOTHER EASY PT. FOR THE TV KIDS

Obstacle Course (consisted of six obstacles; worth 5pts): Rat Trap/Tire Run/Punch Through/Monkey Bars/Rope Swing/Cargo Net

Women’s heat: Kim v. AJ– AJ (9)

Men’s heat: Bronson v. Corbin– CORBIN (12)

TUG OF WAR (10pt event):

W- TV SITCOMS
